plot: Pablo is a painter who suffered a nervous breakdown. While painting he explains us his ideas about his past, his art and his life.
title: Pablo é Vivo
plot_es: Pablo is a painter who suffered a nervous breakdown. While painting he explains us his ideas about his past, his art and his life.
plot_en: Pablo is a painter who suffered a nervous breakdown. While painting he explains us his ideas about his past, his art and his life.
